analysis.description:
PlayCryptoGaming.cryptoGamersAreInitiated (/unique_chucks/19/0xa696e684a37a06ff56985c2dfe4d0d5b6ceeb9b4.sol#27-30) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- InitiateCryptoGamers (/unique_chucks/19/0xa696e684a37a06ff56985c2dfe4d0d5b6ceeb9b4.sol#254-283)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/19/0xa696e684a37a06ff56985c2dfe4d0d5b6ceeb9b4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/19/0xa696e684a37a06ff56985c2dfe4d0d5b6ceeb9b4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_cryptoGamerId' of PlayCryptoGaming.purchaseCryptoGamer (/unique_chucks/19/0xa696e684a37a06ff56985c2dfe4d0d5b6ceeb9b4.sol#48) is not in mixedCase
